name: Cavend
description:
Cavend

Collect as many Gold as you can.

Controls:

Arrow_Left + Arrow_Right = Move

Space = Jump

Game:

Collect gold, if you collect too much you will get slower and loose jump height. To prevent this you must bring the gold into your're wagon. There are multiple endings.

Made for the Mini Jam 85: Gold

Made from: Ultron, Nojama
